# activeExternalSyncVideoFrameDuration

**Instance Property**

The receiver’s external sync frame duration (the reciprocal of its frame rate) when being driven by an external sync device.

## Declaration

```swift
var activeExternalSyncVideoFrameDuration: CMTime { get }
```

## Discussion

Set up your input to follow an external sync device by calling [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDeviceInput/follow(_:videoFrameDuration:delegate:)].



## Synchronizing with external devices

- **isExternalSyncSupported**: Indicates whether the device input supports being configured to follow an external sync device.
- **follow(_:videoFrameDuration:delegate:)**: Configures the the device input to follow an external sync device at the given frame duration.
- **unfollowExternalSyncDevice()**: Discontinues external sync.
- **externalSyncDevice**: The external sync device currently being followed by this input.
